page.title: 01Summary of Culcheth D-block
page.content:
Although we are close to many large towns and cities, our D-block consists mostly of agricultural land, and the village of Culcheth. Our main claim to fame is that the Headquarters of the Atomic Energy Authority are situated on the edge of the village. Because of this, many of its residents are quite well-paid employees of the Authority. We also have Risley Remand Centre nearby, where many prisoners are held awaiting trial. It is a forbidding looking place. There are excellent road communication links, and with all the local parks and countryside around it is a very pleasant and convenient place to live.
{Twiss Green C.P., Newchurch C.P. and {Glazebury C.E. Schools}
